title: Bg. 11.17
sanskrit: किरीटिनं गदिनं चक्रिणं चतेजोराशिं सर्वतो दीप्‍तिमन्तम् ।पश्यामि त्वां दुर्निरीक्ष्यं समन्ता-द्दीप्‍तानलार्कद्युतिमप्रमेयम् ॥ १७ ॥
transliteration: kirīṭinaṁ gadinaṁ cakriṇaṁ catejo-rāśiṁ sarvato dīptimantampaśyāmi tvāṁ durnirīkṣyaṁ samantāddīptānalārka-dyutim aprameyam
literary_trans: Your form is difficult to see because of its glaring effulgence, spreading on all sides, like blazing fire or the immeasurable radiance of the sun. Yet I see this glowing form everywhere, adorned with various crowns, clubs and discs.Your form is difficult to see because of its glaring effulgence, spreading on all sides, like blazing fire or the immeasurable radiance of the sun. Yet I see this glowing form everywhere, adorned with various crowns, clubs and discs.
